Content: We often start the New Year with a whole bunch of resolutions to change our lives for the better. But what if we started this 2024 with a list of wishes that would make the world a better place for people, animals, and nature alike?   1. May every animal farm close down forever 2. May no activist for social justice be prosecuted or sent to prison for defending lives, exposing cruelty, or speaking up. 3. May no more ancestral lands be devastated for profit. 4. May more laws be passed to restore nature and protect wildlife. 5. May whaling be banned forever, everywhere in the world. 6. May all countries in the world ban wild animal circuses and shows. 7. May technology keep innovating to give us even more plant-based alternatives to all animal products.  What are your wishes and hopes for 2024? Add them in the comments below! 👇

Cheers to the start of 2024! 🎉 Embracing new beginnings with fresh accounts and valuable content for our follow list. Resources to learn more 👉  GenV.org/why-vegan/for-the-planet/   Global research shows that farming animals requires vast amounts of fresh water and land  — land that could instead be used to more efficiently grow crops for human consumption, or be allowed to return to its natural state.  We can choose to reject this destructive industry. We can choose more environmentally conscious vegan options instead. Try our free 7-Day Vegan For The Planet challenge today.

As we get older our eating patterns and behaviors are likely to change. While we can get all the nutrients we need on a vegan diet, there are things to be aware of as we age.  One common change as we get older among all diets is that we tend to eat less, which can lead to insufficient intakes of calcium, iron, zinc, B vitamins, and vitamin E. Even getting sufficient calories can be an issue.  But none of this has to be a problem. Learn more about veganism in older age on our website: genv.org/veganism-for-all/veganism-in-older-age/

Technically, yes you can.  By definition, an environmentalist is a person who is concerned with or advocates for the protection of the environment, and there are a wide range of ways in which a person can do this. Nevertheless, avoiding meat and dairy products is understood to be the single biggest way to reduce our environmental impact on the planet. So while flying less, avoiding single-use plastics, cycling to work, buying food locally, taking shorter showers, and protesting fossil fuels are all effective forms of environmental activism, our ability to protect the planet will only ever be a fraction of what it could be if we continue to consume meat and dairy.  Animal agriculture spans all the multitude of environmental problems, from GHG emissions and biodiversity loss, to deforestation and ocean acidification, so if you're an environmentalist who eats meat, then going vegan is something you should strongly consider. 🌎

The use of AI in animal agriculture could worsen the industry’s already unethical practices and its poor environmental track record, but here's the twist – we can also harness the power of AI for positive change! 🔄💡   We can use AI to increase our productivity when advocating for animals, create more transparency, and accelerate the production of plant-based proteins.   Now is the time to use technology to create a compassionate and eco-friendly future. 🌱🤖  🎥 Constance Li from Impactful Animal Advocacy  #TechforGood #SustainableAgriculture #AIRevolution

This is the reality for millions of pigs worldwide. Mothers are trapped in farrowing crates so small they barely fit. Their babies, born into a world of filthy concrete, are taken away when just a few weeks old and put into overcrowded, barren pens where they are fattened for slaughter. The next litter is born, and the cycle continues.  Animals deserve better. By choosing vegan, we play our role in ending these cruel practices.

The dairy industry spends millions of dollars advertising their products every year.  They use terms like “Organic”, “Natural” and “Grass-Fed” to trick people into thinking milk is naturally and humanely produced. One artist, Praxis put up posters and billboards across the United States to reveal the truth behind the advertising facade.  Suddenly oatmilk doesn’t sound so bad, eh?

Vegans are not perfect, nor do we claim to be. But in a world of cruelty — both industrialized and normalized — vegans make an effort not to contribute to animal suffering.  Will you choose not to harm animals today?

Nearly 90% of the world’s wetlands have been degraded since the 1700s, and we are losing wetlands three times faster than forests. A resolution is not in sight, so we urge the compassionate vegan movement to support in any way possible those working to provide humanitarian aid for people and animals on the ground. And we will always support those who are working to help humanity find solutions that can bring peace to all sentient life. A light and creamy dessert without animal exploitation. This passion fruit mousse proves that a plant-based diet can be incredibly simple and delightfully tasty. 🥄✨  📃 INGREDIENTS 50g cashews or peanuts 100g firm tofu 1 large passion fruit, pulp only Yellow fruit jelly to taste  👩‍🍳 INSTRUCTIONS Soak the cashews in hot water for at least 15 minutes. Drain the cashews and blend them with the tofu, the pulp of half a passion fruit, and as much yellow fruit jelly as needed to form a smooth and creamy texture. Divide into bowls and top with the pulp of the other half of the passion fruit for decoration. Serve chilled.  Tip: You can also make a version with strawberries! 🍓  Visit https://GenV.pulse.ly/omygm0mlio and discover more vegan recipes.  #Veganism #VeganRecipe #VeganMousse #VeganSweet #VeganDessert

Being vegan adds more joy and consciousness to the festivities! 🎉  1. Ethical costumes: the magic of carnival lies in diversity and originality. Use ribbons, fringes, or strips of fabric to add texture and movement to your costume.  2. Shine with sustainability. Conventional glitter is a threat to the environment and animals by contaminating soil, rivers, and seas. Replace regular glitter with biodegradable vegan options.  3. Vegan snacks for the festivities. Peanuts, nuts, and various seeds are perfect for quick satiety. Fruits are excellent for refreshing the body and replenishing vitamins and minerals.  4. Conscious hydration. Opt for natural juices, coconut water, and, of course, plenty of water to stay hydrated.  5. Fun, awareness, and inspiration. Prove that celebration and ethics can go hand in hand. Be the inspiration that Carnival needs to be a cruelty-free celebration!

Milk is not harmless. 🥛  Here are some things you should know about the dairy industry: 🥛 Cows are forcibly impregnated repeatedly. 🥛 They are separated from their calves, causing both of them extreme distress. 🥛 When they can no longer produce as much milk, the cows are taken to the slaughterhouse. 🥛If their calves cannot be monetized — raised for veal or milk — they are killed at birth. 🐮 It's time to reconsider dairy consumption and explore plant-based alternatives. Choose veganism #ForTheAnimals.  Try vegan with us today at genv.org/go-vegan!

Our planet is in the midst of a sixth mass extinction, with one-fifth of all mammal species on Earth now threatened 🔥  Guess which industry is the largest driver of species extinction and habitat loss? Animal agriculture.  An area of rainforest the size of 100 football pitches is cut down every hour to provide pasture for farmed animals. Not only is large-scale deforestation devastating to the environment, but it's also a death sentence for the millions of animals who live there, such as jaguars, gorillas, chimpanzees, forest elephants, snow leopards, one-horned rhinos, and Bengal tigers.  If we want to save these animals, we need to change what’s on our plates. 🍽️🌱  Learn how with our free Vegan Challenge https://pulse.ly/q3hf1fo7nt

But we can change this. 🌱 Every choice we make contributes to a more compassionate world.  Choose veganism.🐣💛

Animals feel just like we do. And guess what? This is a scientific fact! 🔬  In July 2012, the Cambridge Declaration on Consciousness was published. An international group of scientists gathered in England to study behaviors related to both human and non-human animals. The evidence indicated that humans are not the only sentient beings.  Animals have the capacity to have conscious experiences, sensations, or perceptions, such as pain, pleasure, and emotions. 🐔🐷🐮  Despite this, we choose to subject them to a life of pain and suffering. But it doesn't have to be this way!  Based on scientific evidence, how about adopting a more humble, empathetic, and loving attitude? 🌍✨  Learn more about sentience on our blog 👇 https://pulse.ly/zznbgdla6y

This is Cross Farm in Devon, a typical British pig farm assured by Red Tractor where “animal welfare is the number one priority”. Red Tractor promised to take action, but a recent visit by a documentary crew revealed appalling conditions and unimaginable suffering. It looks like nothing has changed.  Stressed, sick, and injured animals are living and dying in filth and fear. Don’t be fooled by the marketing claims. These are the “high welfare standards” of British pig farming.  Join us in calling for action by Red Tractor and report Cross Farm in Devon directly to them: enquiries@redtractor.org.uk

😣 Do you know the amount of water it takes to produce meat?  🌱 Veganism, in addition to being an ethical stance against the systematic suffering experienced by animals, is the fight for a fair food system—one that does not destroy ancestral landscapes, pollute waterways, or seize land from Indigenous peoples. It is a system that does not use disproportionate amounts of land and water so that the wealthiest individuals can consume luxury products while others go hungry. 😰  Animal farming consumes a vast amount of resources, deepening the social inequalities characteristic of our era. If we desire a more equitable world where both people and animals do not suffer, veganism is a necessary step towards building it.  💚 Would you like to learn more about the effects of veganism? Sign up at genv.org/go-vegan

🐙👀Octopuses are naturally curious creatures; they need stimulation and challenges since they are highly evolved and intelligent. Plus, two-thirds of their brain is in their tentacles, not in their head! 🤯  Conditions of captivity cause them stress and boredom, and they may even resort to cannibalism due to their territorial nature.  ✨You can contribute to the freedom and well-being of these brilliant animals by not supporting entertainment, breeding, and food made at their expense. To further inspire you, we recommend watching the documentary "My Octopus Teacher," available on Netflix, and subscribing to our challenges to try veganism. Go to genv.org/go-vegan/ and start now!

🙏🌱 This Good Friday, let's think about God's purpose for the animals He placed on Earth. Were animals meant for food?  🌍 Genesis shows God's plan: a plant-based diet for humanity, emphasizing peace and stewardship.  💔 Human sin disrupted this harmony (Genesis 9), prompting a temporary concession to kill for necessity. But every life taken is accountable to God.  📜 Scripture urges us to value others, speak up for those who cannot be heard, and walk justly (Phil. 2:3, Proverbs 31:8-9, Micah 6:8). In this light, the answer becomes clear.  🚫 Factory farms and slaughterhouses don't align with God's plans. As agents of God's love, let's re-evaluate our choices and embrace compassion. So, is it God's intention for us to consume animals? No, and it’s clear throughout scripture that God shows displeasure at animals being killed.  This Good Friday, let's honor God's intentions for His creatures. Choose a path of love, mercy, and justice. Choose veganism 🌿💚  --- https://pulse.ly/d8bfhvl8lu

Easter Reflections 💭✝️  As we celebrate Easter, let's also think about God's original design for our plates.  In Genesis (1:29-30), God specifically tells Adam and Eve the foods he had provided for them to eat. And guess what? They were all plant-based. 🌱🌿✨  After the Fall, sin entered the world, and then everything changed. But the question is: can Christians eat meat?  Eating animals wasn't part of God’s intention when He created the world. For Christians striving to return to the Garden of Eden, not eating meat is a powerful way to get closer to God.  This Easter, consider the connection between faith and food and let's move closer to embodying Jesus' compassion as we rejoice in new life and renewal. Go vegan! 🌷🐰

Chickens raised for their meat, known in the industry as broilers, are slaughtered before they are even 7 weeks old. They never experience life other than that in overcrowded warehouse-style sheds on factory farms.🐔  They have been selectively bred to grow to optimum weights as fast as possible. This has led to unnaturally large-bodied chickens who grow so fast that their legs are unable to support their weight, and their hearts may give out.  🛑Globally 70 billion chickens are farmed and killed annually.  Going vegan is the most effective way to end this suffering. Choose compassion today! 🌱

This is the reality for millions of pigs worldwide. Mothers are trapped in farrowing crates so small they barely fit. The next litter is born and the cycle continues.  Animals deserve better. By choosing vegan, we play our role in ending these cruel practices.

"Vegans eat a lot of soy and that impacts nature and animals." Who's heard this before? 🙋‍♀️  The truth is, a vegan diet is more sustainable and we can prove it! 👇🏿  Each year, the food system kills 80 billion land animals – that is ten times more farmed animals than there are people on the planet.  🔎 And what does that mean? Instead of growing plants to feed 8 billion (humans’) mouths, we are growing food for 80 billion (animals’) mouths. 🤯  🌎If we combine pastures used for grazing with the amount of land used to grow crops for farmed animals’ feed, animal agriculture accounts for 77 percent of global farming land. Meat, eggs, and dairy take up most of the world’s agricultural land but produce just 18 percent of the world’s calories and 37 percent of total protein.  Such a vast waste of feed and land has serious consequences for both the environment and for wild animals.  ⚡ Have you ever stopped to think about this? Let us know in the comments!

These slaughterhouse worker testimonials highlight some of the issues within the meat industry. There is a lot more that is overlooked by greedy corporations who are concerned only about their own profits.  The entire process of farming animals is not only detrimental to the animals and public health, but it is risky for the humans who work in those industries too.  🦠 Zoonotic diseases threaten those working closely with animals. ⚠️ Injury and death rates are high in slaughterhouses and fisheries. 😷 Respiratory illnesses are common due to confined animal farming. 😔 Mental health challenges like PTSD are prevalent among slaughterhouse workers. 🍺🚬 Substance abuse and domestic violence are often linked to slaughter work. 💰 Exploitation of low-income workers is rampant.  Go vegan for the animals and for people.  —----------- https://pulse.ly/16jeyjnbrq  #SafetyandHealth #SocialJustice #Testimonial

Bees don’t make honey for us to eat, or just for fun. They do it because they are clever, complex animals who need a source of food over the winter months.  The sugar water that is given to them in lieu of the honey does not contain the essential nutrients and properties bees need to stay optimally healthy and it is believed that this contributes to the mass deaths of bees and the collapse of honey bee colonies.  Bees can feel joy and pain, they express happiness and sorrow. Studies have even shown that they can count and distinguish shapes and even communicate with each other. There are many plant-based alternatives that can be used as sweeteners without hurting the bees.  Video by: @Aimeeswildlifephotos

⚠️ The animal exploitation industry is also one of the most abusive towards their workers and is among the lowest paid worldwide. Workers are often individuals from vulnerable backgrounds, such as undocumented immigrants, including children and teenagers, and Indigenous and other minoritized communities. They are prone to disabling or fatal accidents and can be fired with impunity.  😔🐄 The Covid-19 pandemic drew attention to the suffering of workers who experienced higher rates of infections. No matter the danger, however, production lines do not stop - not for conscious animals and not for exhausted or sick workers. Journalistic investigations have exposed how employees in slaughterhouses are routinely denied bathroom breaks and have no choice but to wear diapers or urinate on themselves.  🌱You can reduce exploitation and harm to people and animals, and increase the amount of kindness in the world, by trying a plant-based diet. 🩸VEGANISM. PERIOD.🩸 Did you know that a vegan lifestyle can have enormous health benefits for your menstrual cycle? Here are some things you can expect:  A study found that a healthy plant-based diet helped both the length and heaviness of periods. Participants were found to have a raised SHBG level which means their hormones were better regulated.  A connection between an increase in eating meat and an increase in endometriosis has been found. Symptoms of this painful and debilitating condition may be improved with a plant-based diet. Menopause can be severe, ranging from experiencing tremendous heat all over the body and muscle pain to increased anxiety and a significant loss of bone density. But eating a high-fiber diet that is rich in minimally processed soy, nuts, and seeds can alleviate some of these debilitating impacts.  Eating plant-based has A LOT of health benefits. Get ready to discover them by signing up to our 7-Day Vegan for Health challenge for free today!

How Can We Help Elephants?  1. We can support campaigns that seek to end trophy hunting.  2. Support anti-poaching teams, like The Black Mambas, the all-women ranger unit in South Africa, and Akashinga, the world’s first all-women, plant-based, armed anti-poaching unit in Zimbabwe.  3. Loss of habitat is a key problem for elephants, and what we farm and eat is a driving factor. If we all ate plant-based foods, we could reduce global farmland by 75 percent, and that could return to nature.

This problem has a name: bycatch. 🐟⚠️  Almost all of the wild fishes we eat today are caught through longlining, beam, or bottom trawling. Whilst subjecting fish to a slow and distressing death, usually by suffocation, the indiscriminate nature of these modern fishing techniques means that hundreds of other species are also inevitably killed in the process.  The fishing industry is the largest killer of wildlife on the planet.👇  We can help to conserve our ocean ecosystems and reduce suffering by eliminating fish from our diets. 🍽️🌱

Looking for a quick and budget-friendly vegan dessert to make for Mother’s Day? Try this delicious Lemon Carlota - and tell us what you think!  Recipe  Lemon Carlota  🍋You will need:  3 packs of silken tofu (1kg) 3/4 cup lemon juice 3/4 cup sugar 3 teaspoons vanilla extract 2 and 1/2 packets of your favorite vegan cookies/wafer biscuits (check the comments for our recommendations)  Directions:  🍋Add all the ingredients except the cookies to the blender, and process very well until you get a super creamy texture.  In your mold or dessert pan, place a layer of cookies at the bottom. Add a layer of the tofu cream to cover the cookies.  On top of the tofu add another layer of cookies and cover them with another layer of tofu. Continue like this until you finish with a layer of tofu on top. Let it sit in the refrigerator overnight.  🍋The next day decorate with a little lemon zest and leftover cookies. Cut into squares and serve!  💕Save & share this recipe 🔊Let us know if you try this out!  #MothersDay #Recipe #Dessert #VeganDessert #PlantBased

Brazil is facing the worst climate event in the country’s history. In the state of Rio Grande do Sul, South of the country, more than 80,000 people have been displaced after record-breaking floods swept across the state. Grad Brasil, the Group Of Animal Rescue In Disasters, is on the frontline of this crisis saving lives and supporting multispecies families.  GRAD Brasil is one of the initiatives that we proudly nominated to the The Earthshot Prize this year and we continue to be in awe of their heroic work for wild and domestic animals in disaster situations. Did you know that honey is not vegan? #WorldBeeDay  While it may seem like a harmless sweetener, vegans avoid it because it's a product of exploitation and suffering. Here are five reasons why:  1. Honey is made by bees for bees Bees store honey in their hive for the cold winter months when there are no flowers in bloom. Honey is their food.  2. Taking honey from beehives kills bees Bees protect their hives with all their might, but humans smoke them out and gas them so that they can steal honey from the hives. This stresses the bees, makes them disoriented, and can even kill them.  3. Bee farms are cruel After taking the honey, farmers replace it with sugar water. This does not provide the nutrients that bees need, and it reduces their immunity, increasing the risk of sickness and death.  4. Bees are sentient Bees can feel joy and pain, they express happiness and sorrow. Studies have shown that they can count, distinguish shapes, and of course they communicate with each other.  5. Making honey is hard work! Bees painstakingly harvest nectar from thousands of flowers to make honey for themselves. It’s estimated that bees have to visit two million flowers to make one pound (450g) of honey!  There are many plant-based alternatives that can be used as sweeteners without hurting the bees. Let the bees have their honey.  Let's choose kindness for all creatures, no matter their size 🐝🌱.

Whether fish are reared on a farm or caught in the wild, eating them is not sustainable. Between 2000 and 2019, between 1.1 and 2.2 trillion fish were taken out of the ocean every single year, with half of them ending up as feed for farmed fish.  Fish are sentient beings capable of feeling pain. Make a compassionate choice for the animals and our planet. 💙🐟🫶🏼  Try vegan today.

As many as 828 million people go to bed hungry each night.  ⏱️By 2050, the global population is projected to reach nearly 10 billion. The UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) estimates that in 2050, 70 percent more food will be needed in 2050 than what was produced in 2009.😯  👉🏽If all crops were used for direct human consumption, there would be sufficient food to feed those 10 billion people by 2050.  ✅Our food systems need to change.  And we can play our part. One of the most efficient ways is to switch to a diet that requires fewer resources. Switching to a plant-based diet 🌱has the potential to reduce diet-related land use by 76%.👈  ⭐Try our free 7-day Vegan for the Planet challenge.  https://genv.org/why-vegan/for-the-planet/

Calves are separated from their mothers shortly after birth, placed in huts, and often fed using automated systems like this one. This separation causes significant distress for both mother and calf.  The dairy industry is far from natural, normal, or necessary. These practices highlight the often overlooked emotional and ethical issues within the industry, raising important questions about animal welfare and the true cost of dairy production.  #Dairy #Calves #Milk #Cheese #IceCream

Life on an industrial farm is short, miserable, and filled with suffering.💔  🐷 In the first days of life, babies may endure hypothermia, infections, diarrhea, and even the risk of being accidentally crushed by their own mothers.  🐖 The survivors, who are taken away from their mothers after just 4 weeks, are fed highly processed feed to gain weight until they are sent for slaughter.  Pigs are intelligent, affectionate, and social animals. Please consider veganism for them. 🌱  🎥: LCA Europe

Khaal baccha is a dead baby cow whose skin is treated and whose body is stuffed with hay. This “dummy baby” is kept near the mother cow or buffalo so she believes that her child is alive and will continue to produce milk.  Unbelievably, this cruelty is both legal and a common practice in the dairy industry, especially with male calves.  Dairy is cruel to cows and buffaloes.

We believe animal cruelty ethics and laws should be applied across all species... do you?  Learn how to help:

How “natural” is your life?  Why do some people argue that killing animals is "natural" when most of us do not hunt or gather, but instead buy our food pre-packaged from a supermarket? That’s not exactly natural!  We are not confined to the same life-or-death struggle that exists daily in nature. We have modern amenities, many more choices, and a greater understanding of our world than our prehistoric ancestors. Rather than look to the past for guidance, let’s create a better future where humans do not exploit animals and instead live in harmony with nature.  🎥 @earthlingedpage

Live export is cruel and unsustainable.  Every year, millions of animals endure a tortuous long-distance journey on ships. They spend weeks confined in cramped conditions, standing or lying in feces and urine, exposed to extreme weather conditions and diseases, only to ultimately face slaughter at the end of this journey. Aside from the intense suffering of animals, this practice also has another impact: environmental.  In live animal export, feces, urine, and even bodies of dead animals are dumped into the ocean without any treatment, polluting and harming marine life. Live export must end.  🗣 Follow @forum.animal for more information about the protests on June 14th and 15th, in a major action for the International Day Against Live Animal Export!

👨‍👧How vegan would you say your father is? Supporter, fervent fan, founding member... or ABSOLUTE RIVAL?  🤦🏻‍♀️Do you think it's a lost cause to convince him to switch to a plant-based diet? Nothing is impossible and we are sharing some foolproof tips with you:  💚Respect and empathy. Your dad may belong to a generation for whom veganism was not an option. It may take several conversations to discuss the topic. Don't get frustrated or judge him!  🍌Veganize his favorite foods. He might not even notice the difference! 😉  🏋️Healthy dad. Tell him about the benefits of eating plant-based or reducing meat consumption as it helps prevent diseases like diabetes and hypertension.  🐷Tell him why it's important to you. Although it may seem obvious, speaking from the heart about the reasons you chose to change have the potential to convince (or at least interest) your dad.  👉🏽Try sharing with him our blog about VEGANISM and MASCULINITY.  #FathersDay #father #dad #masculinity #veganism

The terror that is so obvious on this piglet's face is experienced by millions of farmed animals every day. We know that animals like her can feel pain, fear, grief, and distress, just as we do.  Why would we knowingly inflict that on them?  📷 Tras los Muros - Aitor Garmendia

🤨🌱 Many times we have heard this myth, sometimes as a genuine doubt, sometimes to discredit veganism. What we know is that plants do NOT feel like animals, including humans; they do not have a brain and there is not enough evidence of any kind of "brain center" in the root, as some have claimed.  While plants communicate with each other, this does not indicate a sense of self or others, and does not imply consciousness. On the other hand, animals are conscious, definitely feel pain, and clearly show their individuality, personality, and agency.  #plants #pain #feel #consciousness

Fear /fɪə/ The feeling when something dangerous, painful, or frightening is about to happen.  🤔If we only took a moment to imagine what every animal on a factory farm must endure before they end up in pieces as “food”.  ✅Try vegan today. Go to: https://pulse.ly/woxrlpu715  🎥 @SentientMediaOrg

🐄 Just like humans, cows carry their calves for nine months, but unlike us, they are artificially inseminated every year to continuously produce milk.  Cows are not the only ones exploited. Animal farming depends on exploiting animals' reproductive capacity, whether for milk, eggs, or even meat.  🗨️ According to Birth Companions, reproductive justice is a “rights-based framework and an intersectional feminist activist movement bringing together reproductive rights and social justice”.  ⚡So, what connects reproductive justice and veganism? 👇

This man stepped in at the right time to save this fawn from drowning. He did the right thing to help someone in their time of need. We may not have the opportunity to perform a rescue, but every meal we have the option to help animals or harm them.  Going vegan isn’t about sacrifice; veganism is about choosing the option that doesn’t harm others.

Animals care about their babies. They protect them, feed them, nurse them, and teach them. Yet the unnatural meat industry tears babies from their mothers, severing their inherent bonds and depriving them of their instinctive duties. Going vegan ensures that humans no longer interfere with or harm animals' families.  Do you believe that the meat industry is anti-mother?

This is what freedom looks like.  The ability to explore, hang out with who you want, walk through nature, and experience many facets of life.  May all living beings get to experience this and may they be happy and free from suffering.  CC: @adilet_rakhmetolla
It has never been easier to #DitchDairy, but what does that really mean?

There are over 1,000 US-style mega-farms in the United Kingdom, with tens of thousands of animals packed together, and treated like commodities instead of living creatures.  As a modern, progressive, compassionate society, how can we accept this?

The world’s oldest animal protection charity was once a trailblazer. But today, the RSPCA not only sanctions the intensive farming and slaughter of sentient beings, it stamps its seal of approval onto the meat from those animals.  What do you think? Should the RSPCA support the farming and slaughter of animals?

Animals are individuals and beings- they are so much more than the numbers the animal agriculture industry wants us to perceive them as. Animals are not commodities; we must stop treating them like they are.  When did you make the connection that animals were more than numbers?

The world is filled with violence and suffering but we as individuals can spread love and kindness throughout the world by speaking up for those whose voices are too often ignored or marginalized.  Generation Vegan’s CEO Naomi Hallum gave this powerful speech on National Animal Rights Day to unify, educate, and inspire activists!  We are so much stronger together.

“Livestock are one of the most significant contributors to today’s most serious environmental problems. Urgent action is required to remedy the situation, and they are a significant contributor to climate change.”

Cow cuddles are some of the best kinds of cuddles!  Most of us have not had the chance to spend much time with these majestic creatures but cows, like all animals, each have their own personalities. Some cows like to cuddle, some like to be on their own, some like to run and fetch, others prefer to lay down and relax.  They are not so different from our companion animals at home, are they? Let’s treat them with kindness by leaving their bodies off our plates.

From destructive bottom trawling in our oceans to disease-ridden, farm-raised fish, the scale and scope of the problem are almost incomprehensible. 🌟🐠  If we truly acknowledged the sentience of fish, we would find it much harder to inflict harm upon them. 🌍💧

Even amidst conflict, Tamara's group remains steadfast in their commitment to veganism.  Shifting gears from education to direct support, they're ensuring Ukrainian soldiers uphold their beliefs while defending sovereignty.  Their impactful work is a true testament to resilience and compassion in the face of adversity. 🌱💪

Every day, thousands of ships haul crabs and other marine species out of the ocean to suffer and die for food. These extreme practices not only harm animals but they also damage the ocean. 🦀  Want to save aquatic life? Stop eating them. 🐟

Chickens raised for their meat, known in the industry as broilers, are slaughtered before they are even 7 weeks old. They never experience life other than that in overcrowded warehouse-style sheds on factory farms.🐔  They have been selectively bred to grow to optimum weights as fast as possible. This has led to unnaturally large-bodied chickens who grow so fast that their legs are unable to support their weight, and their hearts may give out.  🛑Globally 70 billion chickens are farmed and killed annually.  Going vegan is the most effective way to end this suffering. Choose compassion today! 🌱

O interesse econômico da indústria pecuária segue ameaçando os povos indígenas no Brasil.  Neste Dia Mundial dos Povos Indígenas, é importante lembrar que o Marco Temporal é um ataque ao direito ao território dos povos originários, à justiça e aos animais. Por trás dessa medida, há o interesse em flexibilizar as leis de proteção ambiental para exploração da terra com abertura de pastos e monoculturas de grãos usados para ração de animais.   O @veganovitor, que esteve em protestos contra as ameaças do Marco Temporal, conversou com alguns manifestantes sobre a importância de toda a sociedade se unir em torno dessa causa.  Confira o texto que o @veganovitor escreveu para o nosso blog para saber mais: 👇🏽 https://genv.org/pt-br/marco-temporal-um-desastre-de-proporcoes-internacionais/ (link na bio)  Siga a @apiboficial e expresse seu apoio.  Siga também as organizações regionais indígenas de base para fortalecer a luta dos povos indígenas: @apoinme_brasil | @coiabamazonia | @arpinsuloficial | @cons.terena | @atyguasu | @yvyrupa.cgy | @arpinsudestesprj  #ParaTodesVerem: Vitor Ávila entrevista manifestantes em frente ao Palácio do Alvorada, em Brasília.   #MarcoTemporalNÃO #PL2903Não #PL490Não

Mega fazenda de porcos ameaça comunidade indígena maia.   Localizada no município de Izamal, no México, Sitilpech é uma comunidade maia que vem lutando pela preservação e defesa de suas terras, da flora e da fauna contra a poluição e destruição gerada pela criação de animais em sistema industrial.  A comunidade sofreu violência física e ameaças apenas por defender o seu direito à terra. Segundo representantes do grupo "La Esperanza de Sitilpech", a empresa vem abandonando corpos de porcos mortos e despejando excremento dos animais em uma lagoa próxima à fábrica, contaminando as águas da região: "Estamos lutando pela vida e pela saúde, ninguém compra isso".  Agradecemos à @genv_esp pelo trabalho para ajudar a dar visibilidade a essa história. ⚡  Nesta semana do Dia Mundial dos Povos Indígenas, leia mais sobre a situação de Sitilpech no nosso blog: https://genv.org/pt-br/sitilpech/ (Link na nossa bio)  #povosindígenas #sitilpech #veganismointerseccional #direitosindígenas #diamundialdospovosindígenas

A pecuária trata os animais como coisas.   Uma das práticas comuns na indústria é o corte de bico das galinhas e pintinhos. Algumas coisas que você deveria saber sobre a prática:  🐣 O bico é cortado para impedir que as galinhas biquem umas às outras, comportamento comum em situações de estresse causadas pela superlotação.  🐣 Uma parte do bico é cortado com lâminas aquecidas ou infravermelhas, que podem causar dor e estresse nos pintinhos.  🐣 O objetivo é evitar lesões e canibalismo entre as galinhas, situação que poderia afetar sua  produção de ovos.  🐣 O corte dos bicos é altamente controverso devido ao seu impacto negativo no bem-estar animal e tem sido objeto de regulamentação em alguns países.  Leia mais sobre no nosso blog sobre a crueldade da indústria do ovo: https://genv.org/pt-br/producao-de-ovos-fatos-sobre-a-industria-de-ovos/ (link na bio).  🐥 Quer parar de comer ovo e não sabe como? Conta pra gente nos comentários, nós podemos ajudar!   #ParaTodesVerem: Vídeo mostra uma fábrica onde uma esteira roda lotada de pintinhos. Uma pessoa vai retirando pintinhos da esteira e passando um por um em uma máquina que corta os bicos dos animais. Assim que o bico da ave é cortado, a pessoa joga o pintinho para outro compartimento. O movimento é repetido em série.  #focinhosdoinsta #amoanimais #amoraosanimais #galinha #galinhas #veganismo #vegano #veganos #animalnãoécoisa #animalnãoéproduto #patinhasdoinsta #animaisfofos

Você sabe como vive uma galinha na indústria dos ovos? 🐓  Galinhas exploradas pela indústria são confinadas em gaiolas minúsculas, sem espaço nem para abrirem as asas.   Para a pecuária, os animais são apenas recursos para gerar lucro. Mas animal não é coisa. Descubra o veganismo para saber como fazer escolhas mais compassivas. 🌱   Precisa de ajuda para saber como começar? Conta pra gente nos comentários.👇  #ParaTodesVerem: uma galinha aparece com expressão triste. Ao lado, aparece a seguinte frase: "Mais de 200 milhões de galinhas estão confinadas em gaiolas no Brasil".  #ovo #veganismo #crueldade #galinheiro #animalnãoécoisa #animalnãoécomida #amoanimais #semovo

O @santuarioamorquesalva resgatou esta pequenina perdida perto de um local de criação de galinhas para produção de ovos.   Bicos cortados, prisão em gaiolas minúsculas, ferimentos, estresse e morte... Esses são os danos provocados pela indústria dos ovos. Você acha justo?  A pequena Tulipa tem ferimentos na pata, não consegue andar e está com diarreia, mas felizmente recebeu a oportunidade de finalmente viver bem e em paz.    Para mudar esse cenário de crueldade animal, considere o veganismo. 💚  #ParaTodesVerem: imagens mostram a pequena Tulipa e as marcas da crueldade que ela sofreu na indústria de ovos. Ela recebe cuidados como banho, secagem, corte de unhas e carinho no santuário.  #granja #galinha #ovo #veganismo #crueldade #galinheiro #amoanimais #animaisfofos #vegano #veganos #resgate #resgateanimal

Hoje lançamos nossa campanha Earthshot de  £ 1 milhão.   Alguns de vocês podem estar se perguntando: o que é Earthshot?   O @earthshotprize é uma premiação criada pelo Príncipe William que reconhece iniciativas trabalhando para solucionar os maiores desafios ambientais do mundo. A cada ano, o prêmio concede £ 1 milhão para cinco iniciativas de destaque que se dedicam a preservar nosso planeta para as futuras gerações. 🌎  No entanto, essas cinco categorias do prêmio Earthshot não atingem o necessário para preservar nosso planeta, porque não abordam nosso destrutivo sistema alimentar à base de exploração animal. É por isso que a Geração Vegana está pedindo respeitosamente ao príncipe que inclua uma sexta categoria no prêmio Earthshot para promover um sistema alimentar à base de plantas. Estamos oferecendo o valor do primeiro prêmio de £ 1 milhão dado nesta categoria, se ele aceitar. 💰  Quer ajudar?   📢 Incentive o comitê do @Earthshotprize a responder ao nosso pedido publicando um tweet, marcando o perfil do prêmio e usando a hashtag #EarthshotPrize.   🥙 Dê uma chance à Terra participando do nosso programa de 7 dias de veganismo pelo planeta. Link na bio em @genv_brasil.  Topa se juntar a nós para proteger o planeta que chamamos de lar? 💚   #Earthshot #EarthshotPrize #SoluçõesSustentáveis #PlantBased #MudançaClimática #Sustentabilidade #SejaaMudança #PeloPlaneta #PelosAnimais #SalveoPlaneta #Veganismo #Vegano #Veganos

Quer se juntar a nós?  Veja como ajudar:   📢 Espalhe a campanha! Use #EarthshotPrize e marque @Earthshotprize, pedindo para o príncipe aceitar nosso pedido.   🥙 Adote um estilo de vida que seja sustentável para o planeta. Hoje, o STF retomou o julgamento do Marco Temporal.  Seguiremos manifestando nosso apoio ao direito soberano das comunidades indígenas sobre seus territórios contra os ataques orquestrados pelo agronegócio.  A Bancada do Boi já demostrou que seu interesse no avanço do Marco Temporal quando os membros da Frente Parlamentar da Agropecuária reuniram mais de 75% dos votos a favor do PL que tenta transformar essa tese em lei.  Leia, no nosso blog, o post que o Vegano Vitor escreveu explicando melhor a conexão entre o Marco Temporal e o interesse da indústria pecuária: "Um ataque aos povos originários é um ataque à terra, à justiça e aos animais. Nós, como veganes, não podemos nos manter calades diante de um ataque tão grotesco. #MarcoTemporalNão!" 👇🏽 https://genv.org/pt-br/marco-temporal-um-desastre-de-proporcoes-internacionais/  Siga a APIB - Articulação dos Povos Indígenas do Brasil  e expresse seu apoio.  #DemarcaçãoJá #MarcoTemporalNÃO #DemarcaçãoÉDemocracia

Além de toda crueldade causada, o ciclo de calorias de consumo de carne animal pode chegar a até 97,5% de desperdício de alimentos na produção.   Imagine quanto alimento deixaríamos de desperdiçar com a pecuária se o nosso sistema alimentar fosse à base de plantas, sem contar com os animais como "intermediários"?  Para cada 40 calorias ingeridas por uma vaca, apenas uma é convertida quando a carne deste animal é consumida, ou seja, uma conversão de apenas 2,5%.  Sabemos que uma mudança no nosso sistema alimentar é essencial para o nosso planeta, por isso pedimos que o Príncipe William crie uma sexta categoria no Prêmio Earthshot para iniciativas que promovam um sistema alimentar à base de plantas! @princeandprincessofwales  O @earthshotprize é uma premiação criada pelo Príncipe William que reconhece iniciativas trabalhando para solucionar os maiores desafios ambientais do mundo. A cada ano, o prêmio concede £ 1 milhão para cinco iniciativas de destaque que se dedicam a preservar nosso planeta para as futuras gerações. 🌎  No entanto, essas cinco categorias do prêmio Earthshot não atingem o necessário para preservar nosso planeta, porque não abordam nosso destrutivo sistema alimentar à base de exploração animal. É por isso que a Geração Vegana está pedindo respeitosamente ao príncipe que inclua uma sexta categoria no prêmio Earthshot para promover um sistema alimentar à base de plantas. Estamos oferecendo o valor do primeiro prêmio de £ 1 milhão dado nesta categoria, se ele aceitar. 💰  Quer ajudar?  📢 Incentive o comitê do @Earthshotprize a responder ao nosso pedido publicando um tweet, marcando o perfil do prêmio e usando a hashtag #EarthshotPrize.  🥙 Dê uma chance à Terra participando do nosso programa de 7 dias de veganismo pelo planeta. 🚚 Acidentes com caminhões que transportam animais para fazendas ou frigoríficos são muito comuns no mundo todo.   Há pouco mais de 8 anos, vimos isso acontecer no Brasil quando uma carreta com mais de 100 porcas tombou no Rodoanel, em São Paulo. Este ano, o caminhão deste vídeo capotou na Espanha há mais ou menos um mês.   Algumas das porcas acidentadas no Rodoanel tiveram a sorte de serem resgatadas e, hoje, vivem protegidas no @santuarioterradosbichos. Mas muitos dos animais envolvidos em acidentes morrem sofrendo, muitas vezes sem atendimento veterinário. É hora de acabar com toda essa crueldade.   Se você é uma pessoa que pode escolher o que comer, escolha não compactuar com a crueldade animal. Escolha o veganismo. 🌱  Contribua para o @santuarioterradosbichos e ajude a proteger as porcas do Rodoanel. 🐷  🎥: @partidopacma   #ParaTodesVerem: vídeo mostra um caminhão tombado e diversos porcos caídos na estrada, muitos deles com seus corpos imóveis.   #amoanimais #amoraosanimais #porco #porcos #animalnãoécoisa #animalnãoécomida #focinhosdoinsta #patinhasdoinsta #vegano #veganismo

Já ouviu falar em greenwashing? 💸  Esta é uma prática enganosa que consiste em afirmações infundadas sobre sustentabilidade ambiental, ética ou social com o objetivo de vender um produto ou serviço. Ou seja, o público é levado a acreditar que está gastando dinheiro de maneira ética, mas na verdade está sendo enganado para gerar lucro para essas companhias.  Sabe aquela empresa que fala em "criação livre" ou "abate humanizado"? Pois é. Não existe exploração de animais ou do meio ambiente de maneira ética. Existe apenas crueldade nessas práticas.   Neste Dia Mundial da Amazônia, aprenda mais sobre esta prática no carrossel acima e vamos combater essa tática tão nociva para o planeta, os animais e a nossa sociedade.   Se este conteúdo for útil para você, salve e compartilhe.  #greenwashing #meioambiente #veganismo #ética #vegano #DiaMundialDaAmazônia

Turn on the audio and listen to the sounds of the forest. 🌳  On this World Amazon Day, it is important to remember that the main cause of deforestation in Brazil is animal agriculture. Brazilian beef production which is exported for consumption all over the world is the main reason for the destruction of the Amazon.  📍 Croa River, State of Acre, Brazil   Visit GenV.org to learn more 🌱  ------------  Ligue o áudio e ouça os sons da floresta. 🌳  Neste Dia Mundial da Amazônia, é importante lembrar que a indústria que mais desmata no Brasil é a pecuária. A produção de carne que é exportada para o mundo todo é a principal razão para a destruição da Amazônia.   📍 Rio Croa, Acre, Brasil   Acesse GeracaoV.org para saber mais 🌱  🎥 @pedrodevani

A pecuária é uma das principais causas das mudanças climáticas, e esses efeitos já estão sendo sentidos em todo o mundo. Pesquisas mostram que a ação de maior impacto que um indivíduo pode tomar para combater esta tendência prejudicial é escolher uma alimentação à base de plantas.  A escolha de uma alimentação vegetal ajuda o nosso planeta e pode garantir que as gerações futuras viverão em um mundo habitável. 🌎  Faça a sua parte para evitar as mudanças climáticas. Junte-se a nós no nosso pedido ao @princeandprincessofwales para que ele crie uma 6ª categoria do prêmio @Earthshotprize, que contemple iniciativas trabalhando para promover um sistema alimentar à base de plantas.   Inscreva-se em nosso programa gratuito de 7 dias de veganismo #PeloPlaneta.🌱 (link na bio em @genv_brasil)  💚 @GenesisButler_, ativista e apoiadora da GenV.  #ParaTodesVerem: Genesis Butler é uma adolescente negra de cabelos escuros presos em um coque alto. Ela conversa com o dr. Joseph Poore, um homem branco de cabelos curtos, lisos e escuros. No vídeo, é possível ver, além deles, imagens de queimadas, vacas, galinhas, porcos, peixes e camarões sendo explorados.  #Earthshot #EarthshotPrize #SoluçõesSustentáveis #PlantBased #MudançaClimática #Sustentabilidade #SejaaMudança #PeloPlaneta #PelosAnimais #SalveoPlaneta #Veganismo #Vegano #Veganos

Derrubando mitos sobre o veganismo! 🤜🏼💥🤛🏼  Diretor executivo do @forum.animal, Taylison Santos (@humantay_/) explica que escolher o veganismo não é sinônimo de perfeição.  Somos humanos e estamos suscetíveis aos erros, mas o importante é aprender a partir desses erros e continuar em busca de ser uma pessoa melhor para a humanidade, para os animais e para o planeta!   E aí, concorda com o Taylison? Conta pra gente nos comentários. 👇  #ParaTodesVerem: Taylison é um homem branco de cabelos e barba escuros. Ele usa uma roupa toda preta, e a camisa tem o logo da GenV. Ele está diante de um fundo colorido com imagens de animais.  #veganismo #vegano #veganos #erros #aprendizado #evolução

A indústria da produção de ovos e de leite não tem limites na crueldade e explora corpos de vacas e galinhas em busca do lucro.   Galinhas têm seus bicos cortados e sequer podem abrir as asas nas granjas, vacas são inseminadas artificialmente à força e são separadas de seus bebês assim que eles nascem.   Os filhotes machos das duas espécies têm como destino a morte por não terem valor econômico para estas indústrias. 🐄🐓  Prefira alimentos sem esse sofrimento. Escolha o veganismo. 💚🌱  Quer parar de consumir ovos e laticínios? Ao lado, está a seguinte frase da atriz: "Laticínios não vêm apenas de vacas e galinhas, eles vêm de fêmeas dessas espécies. Estamos explorando seus corpos e abusando da magia das fêmeas para produzir ovos e leite".  #amoanimais #animaisfofos #amoraosanimais #veganismo #vegano #animalnãoécoisa #patinhasdoinsta #focinhosdoinsta

Derrubando mitos sobre o veganismo! 🤜🏼💥🤛🏼  A querida chef vegana e designer Rita Parente nos ajudou a explicar que, no veganismo, não precisamos excluir a comida afetiva do nosso cardápio, apenas adaptá-la aos ingredientes livres de exploração animal.   E garantimos que os resultados são fantásticos. Por aqui, adoramos a "cogumelhoada", a versão da bacalhoada com cogumelos, nas festas de fim de ano. E você, tem alguma substituição clássica? Conta nos comentários.   Quer a receita da "cogumelhoada"? Acesse o ebook de Receitas Veganas Natalinas em nosso site: https://genv.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Receitas-Veganas-Natalinas-GenV-com-Ivan-Di-Simoni.pdf (link na bio).  #ParaTodesVerem: Rita é uma mulher branca de cabelo curto rosa e tatuagens nos braços. Ela usa óculos, blusa e tênis pretos e uma calça jeans.  #veganismo #vegano #veganos #alimentaçãosaudável #receitasveganas #cozinhacriativa #comidaafetiva

A jovem ativista @genesisbutler_ esteve com a gente na semana do clima de Nova York para levar uma carta a Sua Alteza Real o Príncipe William, que esteve na cidade para a cúpula do prêmio Earthshot.   Na carta, ela pergunta se o príncipe William estaria disposto a adicionar ao prêmio Earthshot uma nova categoria para promover um sistema alimentar à base de plantas.   Não podemos salvar o planeta sem mudar a forma como comemos e sem abordar o nosso sistema alimentar insustentável. Ativistas como Genesis ajudam a colocar holofotes nessas discussões importantes – e este é o primeiro passo para criar mudanças significativas. 👏🏿  Quer ajudar?  📢 Mande uma mensagem para o prêmio @Earthshotprize incentivando o comitê a responder ao nosso pedido.  🥙 Dê uma chance à Terra participando do nosso programa de 7 dias de veganismo pelo planeta. Link na bio em @genv_brasil.  Junte-se a nós para proteger o planeta que chamamos de lar. 💚  #ParaTodesVerem: Genesis é uma adolescente negra. Ela está com os cabelos presos para trás e segura a carta para o príncipe William aberta, mostrando-a para a câmera, enquanto sorri discretamente para a foto.  #Earthshot #EarthshotPrize #SoluçõesSustentáveis #PlantBased #MudançaClimática #Sustentabilidade #SejaaMudança #PeloPlaneta #PelosAnimais #SalveoPlaneta #Veganismo #Vegano #Veganos

Ao contrário do que muita gente pensa, a produção de leite de vaca é extremamente cruel com os animais.   Além de as vacas serem inseminadas artificialmente à força e serem obrigadas a ter um número de gestações muito maior que o saudável, elas também são afastadas de seus bebês assim que eles nascem, e muitos desses bezerros são mortos logo após o nascimento.  Como os machos não produzem leite, eles não têm utilidade para indústria e acabam tendo como destino a morte, vendidos para a produção de vitela.   Não financie este processo cruel. Escolha o veganismo.🌱  Precisa de ajuda para parar com os laticínios? Deixa um comentário, e a gente te ajuda a encontrar alternativas deliciosas!  #ParaTodesVerem: um bezerro aparece encolhido e com uma expressão assustada. Ao lado dele, aparece a seguinte frase: "Dezenas de milhares de bezerros são mortos logo após o nascimento pela indústria do leite."  #semleite #semlactose #animalnãoécoisa #amoanimais #leitevegetal #leite #leitecondensado #iogurtecaseiro #iogurtevegano #queijos #queijovegano #queijovegetal #vegano #veganismo #veganos #amoraosanimais #vaca #bezerro

A indústria do leite animal tem diversas camadas de crueldade com vacas, bois e bezerros.   Muitas pessoas insistem em dizer que o veganismo não é "natural". Entretanto, a verdade é que beber leite de outra espécie não é natural. Afastar esses bebês de suas mães também não. E é ainda menos natural colocar animais em cubículos, como se fossem máquinas, para receberem mamadeiras em vez de amamentarem em suas mães.  A indústria do leite não tem nada de natural. E, se você tem condições de escolher o que come, pode optar por deixar os laticínios fora da alimentação. Pelo bem dos animais, escolha o veganismo. 🌱  Encontre receitas práticas de leite vegetal em nosso site: https://genv.org/pt-br/go-vegan/ (link na bio em @genv_brasil)  #ParaTodesVerem: homens distribuem mamadeiras para bezerros presos em minúsculas gaiolas para recém nascidos da indústria do leite. Dois homens estão em cima de duas carretas carregadas de mamadeiras que são puxadas por um trator. O trator passa por um corredor de gaiolas que se estende por uma longa distância. A câmera gira para mostrar o local e vemos que há milhares de bezerros a perder de vista confinados nas gaiolas.  #semleite #semlactose #animalnãoécoisa #amoanimais #leitevegetal #leite #leitecondensado #iogurtecaseiro #iogurtevegano #queijos #queijovegano #queijovegetal #amoraosanimais #vaca #bezerro

Todas as culturas passam por mudanças ao longo do tempo.   Em nossa História, a humanidade já modificou muitas práticas consideradas tradicionais que com o passar do tempo foram reconhecidas como opressivas e injustas.  Não precisamos de um animal no prato para celebrar as datas tradicionais. O importante é o sentimento compartilhado de estar com quem amamos. Assim, garantimos uma celebração que não cause sofrimento aos outros animais. 💚🐔🐮🐷🦃  Se puder escolher o que comer, escolha proteger os animais da exploração na indústria. Escolha o veganismo. 🌱  #ParaTodesVerem: imagem destaca o olhar assustado de uma vaca preta e branca. Ao lado, aparece a seguinte frase: "Tradição e cultura não são desculpas para o abuso de animais".  #veganismo #tradição #cultura #respeitoaosanimais #amoanimais #animalnãoécomida #amoraosanimais #vegano

A Geração Vegana marcou presença em Nova York para pedir ao Príncipe William uma sexta categoria no @earthshotprize, com foco em iniciativas que promovam um sistema alimentar à base de plantas.   A principal ação que um indivíduo pode tomar para combater as mudanças climáticas é a adesão a um sistema alimentar à base de plantas. Esta escolha é essencial para garantir que as gerações futuras tenham um mundo habitável para viver. 🌎  Faça a sua parte para evitar as mudanças climáticas. Junte-se a nós no nosso pedido ao @princeandprincessofwales para que ele crie uma 6ª categoria do prêmio @Earthshotprize, que contemple iniciativas trabalhando para promover um sistema alimentar à base de plantas.  Inscreva-se em nosso programa gratuito de 7 dias de veganismo #PeloPlaneta.🌱 (link na bio em @genv_brasil)  #ParaTodesVerem: Genesis Butler é uma adolescente negra e é ela que faz a introdução do vídeo, falando no microfone. Ela veste roupas pretas e está com o cabelo preso. Genesis está junto de um grupo de ativistas em frente ao Hotel Plaza em Nova York, onde estava acontecendo um evento do Prêmio Earthshot. Os ativistas estão segurando cartazes que pedem um sistema alimentar à base de plantas e um grande cheque de 1 milhão de libras ao Prêmio Earthshot, além de imagens do Príncipe William. Diversos manifestantes falam no microfone e deixam sua mensagem no vídeo.  #Earthshot #EarthshotPrize #SoluçõesSustentáveis #PlantBased #MudançaClimática #Sustentabilidade #SejaaMudança #PeloPlaneta #PelosAnimais #SalveoPlaneta #Veganismo #Vegano #Veganos

Você sabia que as redes de pesca ameaçam mamíferos marinhos?   Estima-se que as redes de pesca descartadas no oceano impactam cerca de 69.000 animais marinhos POR DIA. São cerca de 580 kg de redes jogadas no mar diariamente em nosso país, segundo relatório da World Animal Protection.  Qual a solução? Tirar todos os animais marinhos do nosso prato e não financiar uma indústria que despeja toneladas de plástico em nossos oceanos todos os anos.  Opte por alternativas veganas, que são saborosas, sustentáveis e sem crueldade.   Precisa de ajuda para transicionar para o veganismo? A gente te ajuda! Diz aí nos comentários.  Conheça os nossos programas de 7 ou 30 dias de veganismo: https://genv.org/pt-br/go-vegan/   🎥 Via @getupandgosilversprings  #ParaTodesVerem: peixe-boi aparece dentro do mar azul amamentando seu filhote.   #amoanimais #animalnãoécoisa #animalnãoécomida #veganismo #vegano #veganos #vidamarinha #amoraosanimais #focinhosdoinsta

Crise na vida selvagem: um choque de realidade. 🦓🌿  Vamos detalhar:  📉 Estatísticas alarmantes: 60% das populações animais do mundo desapareceram desde 1970. 🐄 Impacto da pecuária: esta prática é um dos principais contribuintes para a extinção de espécies. 🌱 Alimentos veganos x produtos animais: precisamos de muito menos terra para produzir alimentos veganos em relação aos produtos de origem animal.  🌳 Destruição de habitat: pasto e a produção pecuária provocam a destruição de florestas. 🌿 Consequência trágica: habitats destruídos, animais selvagens perdem suas casas e espécies inteiras são levadas extinção.  🌾 Dilema da soja: a culpa é da soja? A maior parte da produção da soja tem como destino a alimentação de animais explorados em fazendas, especialmente galinhas.  É hora de conscientização e mudança! 🌍💪 Vamos fazer escolhas sustentáveis ​​para o nosso planeta e para a vida selvagem. Para mais informações, acesse GeracaoV.org.  #ParaTodesVerem: bebê e mamãe gorila se olham com amor. O filhote encosta a cabecinha na mãe com ternura.  #amoanimais #vidaselvagem #animais #animal

🐹Provavelmente você já usou uma dessas frases em algum momento, e se você continua usando, nós te convidamos a tirar um tempo para ler as informações a seguir. Quando a linguagem é usada para discriminar ou objetificar animais, isto indica que há um preconceito chamado "especismo".   ​🤝Nós temos uma obrigação ética de garantir que nossas ações não fazem mal ou desconsideram os interesses de outros animais (sim, humanos também são animais). ​  ⚠️Embora a imagem tenha como objetivo facilitar a compreensão da linguagem especista, a linguagem é uma consequência da nossa mentalidade, não o contrário. Não podemos mudar a linguagem sem antes abordar os preconceitos sociais.  🌱Precisamos trabalhar no combate à mentalidade que coloca outros animais em segundo plano, às vezes até com desprezo.  💚 Deveríamos nos esforçar para eliminar qualquer tipo de linguagem especista que ainda esteja presente no nosso dia a dia em reconhecimento à dignidade de animais de outras espécies.  #ParaTodesVerem: imagem mostra a seguinte mensagem: "Linguagem especista que você não deveria usar em 2024 e por quê.  'Que sujeira! Você é um porco!'   'Eles não são confiáveis, são umas cobras!'   'É o meu animal de estimação.'"  #veganismo #amoanimais #amoraosanimais #patinhasdoinsta #focinhosdoinsta

Sentimos gratidão pela nossa comunidade incrível e mal podemos esperar pelo que 2024 nos reserva! 💚  #veganismo #amoraosanimais #vegano

Mudar para uma alimentação vegana não precisa ser uma tarefa difícil. 🙅‍♂️🌭🍔🎉  Em vez de pensar no "para sempre", dê um passo de cada vez. Assuma o compromisso de adotar o veganismo por uma semana ou um mês, focando em um dia de cada vez. 🗓️  Nos primeiros dias, é normal ter uma mistura de sentimentos, talvez até sentir um pouco de nostalgia. Faz parte da jornada.  Estamos com você! 🙌 Inscreva-se nos nossos programas gratuitos de 7 ou 30 dias de veganismo. Você vai receber motivação diária, receitas deliciosas e um guia de saúde e nutrição que vai tornar sua transição mais suave! 📧📚🌮  Aceita o desafio? Vamos começar esta aventura lado a lado! हम अक्सर नए साल की शुरुआत अपने जीवन को बेहतर बनाने के लिए ढेर सारे संकल्पों के साथ करते हैं। लेकिन क्या होगा अगर हम इस 2024 की शुरुआत उन इच्छाओं की कामना करके करें जो इच्छाएं दुनिया के लोगों, जानवरों और प्रकृति के लिए एक बेहतर जगह बनाएंगी?  2024 के लिए आपकी इच्छाएँ और आशाएँ क्या हैं? नीचे कमेंट करके हमें बताएं! 👇  We often start the New Year with a whole bunch of resolutions to change our lives for the better. But what if we started this 2024 with a list of wishes for the year to come, wishes that would make the world a better place for people, animals, and nature alike?   What are your wishes and hopes for 2024? Add them in the comments below! 👇  #NewYear #HealTheWorld #HighHopes

The dairy industry has many well-kept secrets.🤫  We imagine cows and buffaloes are happy to give us their milk and their calves get their share. But many people are not aware of what goes on in dairy farms.   The dairy industry confines cows, denies the calves of their own mothers’ milk, and often starves the calves to death.💔 Cows and buffaloes from dairy farms end up in slaughter houses.  It happens everywhere. In every single village, city, country.  Go vegan today to stop this injustice.🙏🏽  Go to www.GenV.org to learn more.

Farming animals carries significant implications for our planet and public health, while also inflicting immense suffering on animals. But one often overlooked aspect is the threat it poses to the very people who work in these industries.   While we are often focused on the ethics of meat production, it’s also important to shed light on the risks to those working on farms in slaughterhouses. In this blog, we highlight some of the many risks associated with this kind of occupation.

We don't need to depend on dairy for our calcium requirements. There are more than enough plant-based sources of calcium available for that!  Ditch Dairy! 🚫   Flavour your meals with powdered sesame seeds in soups🥣, salads🥗, and dals or indulge in a post-meal delight with a sesame laddu. 👌🏽  ✨Go to our website and try one of our delicious vegan recipes!✨ https://genv.org/recipes/  #vegan #calcium #healthyeating #govegan #vegansofig #nutrition #sesame #healthybones #eathealthy #lactosefree #ditchdairy #nondairy #nodairy #dairyfree
That the animal industry affects the animals is known, but an often hidden aspect of this industry is the damage it causes to the environment and the people living around these farms.

🐝क्या आप जानते हैं…  हम जो भोजन खाते हैं उसका एक-तिहाई हिस्सा मधुमक्खी के परागण पर निर्भर करता है, फिर भी मधुमक्खियों की आबादी में गिरावट आ रही है - विडंबना यह है कि हम जिस तरह से भोजन की खेती करते हैं, वह मधुमक्खियों की आबादी में गिरावट कारण बन रहा है।🌾  अब बड़ी मात्रा में कृषि भूमि केवल एकल फसलों को उगाने के लिए इस्तेमाल की जा रही है जैसे कृषि भूमि पर केवल मकई और सोयाबीन जैसी एकल फसलें ही उगाई जा रही हैं, इस कारण से मधुमक्खियों को उनकी जरूरतों को पूरा करने के लिए पर्याप्त पोषण या मौसमी विविधता नहीं मिल पाती है।  लेकिन इसका मांस और डेयरी से क्या लेना-देना है?🥛🍗  यह समझना आसान है: ऐसा इसीलिए होता है क्योंकि हम जो फसलें उगाते हैं उनमें से बहुत सी फसलें पशु पालन उद्योग के पशुओं को खिलाई जाती हैं।  हम मधुमक्खियों को बचाने के लिए क्या कर सकते हैं?   शुरुआत के लिए, हम मांस और डेयरी का उपभोग कम कर सकते हैं और अधिक जैविक फल और सब्जियां खा सकते हैं। इससे जिन स्वस्थ पराग के प्राकृतिक और विविध स्रोतों की मधुमक्खियों को आवश्यकता है, उन्हें फिर से पुनर्स्थापित करने में मदद मिलेगी।🌻  📽️@aimeeswildlifephotos🐝

चिकन अद्वितीय, बुद्धिमान और संवेदनशील शख्स हैं, फिर भी हम उनके साथ बहुत बुरा व्यवहार करते हैं। उन्हें अंधेरे, तंग और अमानवीय परिस्थितियों में पाला जाता है। वे अपना प्राकृतिक व्यवहार व्यक्त नहीं कर पाते हैं और उनका चुनिन्दा रूप से प्रजनन कराया जाता है ताकि वे तेज़ी से मोटे और बढ़े हों जिससे उनके स्वास्थ्य पर बहुत बुरा असर पड़ता है। महज 42-47 दिन की उम्र में उनका हिंसक तरीके से कत्ल कर दिया जाता है।  चाहे इस व्यक्तियों/जीवों/ शख्स के फर, मछली का पंख या पक्षी का पंख हों, हमें हर शख्स/किसी को वह सम्मान देना चाहिए जिसके वे हकदार हैं।  क्या आप अभी भी चिकन खाते हैं? यदि हाँ तो हमारे बायो लिंक पर क्लिक करके यह पता लगायें कि ये चिकन हमारी खाने की थालियों तक कैसे पहुँचते हैं।  —————————  Chickens are unique, intelligent, and sensitive individuals, yet we treat them horribly. They are raised in dark, cramped, and inhumane conditions. They cannot express natural behaviors and are selectively bred to grow rapidly at great expense to their health. They are violently slaughtered at just 42-47 days old.  Whether they have fur, feathers, or fins, we should treat everyone with the respect they deserve.  Do you still eat chicken? If so, it’s important to know how they end up on your plate via the link in our bio.  —————————— genv.org/chicken-slaughter/  #AllBeGenV #GenVIndia #chicken #chickens #chicken farm #bird #birds #birdlover #birdlovers #birdsofinstagram #birdphotography #birdgang #animal #animals #animalkingdom #animallover #animallovers #animalrights #animallove #animalplanet #animaladdicts #animalliberation #animalsanctuary #saveanimals #animallife #animalfriends

Did you know…. 🐋   Over 300,000 whales and dolphins are accidentally caught and killed in commercial fishing nets every year.   Today, bycatch is the leading cause for the decline of 11 of 13 critically endangered species on the International Union for Conservation of Nature’s Red List.  Let’s take a moment to think about how our choices impact the world around us, as well as the beautiful and diverse beings who call Earth their home.  🎥 Credit @timmboslice_   ___________ #whales #whalewatching #oceanlover #oceanlife #oceanconservation #saveouroceans #saveourplanet #donteatthehomies #friendsnotfood #fishingindustry #tryvegan

Take a moment to reconsider the notion of meat consumption as merely a "personal choice." Does the argument hold if another individual sentient being is harmed in the process?  By adopting a vegan lifestyle, we embrace a higher sense of compassion and responsibility. Let's make a conscious decision to tread a path of kindness and ethical living. 🌍💚  इस बात पर पुनर्विचार करने के लिए कुछ समय लें कि मांस खाना आपका "व्यक्तिगत निर्णय" है। क्योंकि यदि मांस खाने कि इस प्रक्रिया में किसी अन्य संवेदनशील प्राणी (जैसे मनुष्य) को नुकसान पहुंचता तो क्या तब भी यह तर्क मान्य होता?  वीगन जीवनशैली अपनाने से, हम करुणा और जिम्मेदारी की उच्च भावना को अपनाते हैं। आइए दयालुता और नैतिक जीवन के मार्ग पर चलने का सचेत निर्णय लें। 🌍💚  #ChooseCompassion #EthicalLiving #VeganJourney #ConsciousChoices #MakeADifference #KindnessMatters #HealthyLiving #AnimalRights

स्वस्थ एंजाइम, हार्मोन और एंटीबॉडी के लिए और मांसपेशियों के निर्माण और मरम्मत के लिए प्रोटीन की आवश्यकता होती है, इसलिए यह महत्वपूर्ण है कि हमें पर्याप्त मात्रा में प्रोटीन मिले। हालाँकि, प्रोटीन की कमी होना वास्तव में कठिन है क्योंकि लगभग हर भोजन - जिसमें अनाज, आलू, सब्जियाँ और फल शामिल हैं - में यह होता है।  वनस्पति आधारित खाद्य पदार्थों में हमारी दैनिक जरूरतों को पूरा करने के लिए पर्याप्त प्रोटीन होता है।

गले और स्तन कैंसर के लिए लगातार कीमोथेरेपी उपचार के बाद, टेनेसी के मर्फ़्रीसबोरो की मैरी-बेथ के बाएं फेफड़े में तीन ट्यूमर का पता चला। पौधे-आधारित आहार आज़माने के उनके निर्णय ने सब कुछ बदल दिया। 🌱  पूरी फिल्म के लिए @Genv_India बायो लिंक का अनुसरण करें। वीगन जीवनशैली अपनाने के लिए साइन अप करें और 2024 में अपनी स्वास्थ्य यात्रा शुरू करें।  After back-to-back chemotherapy treatments for throat and breast cancer, Mary-Beth of Murfreesboro, Tennessee, was diagnosed with three tumors in her left lung. Her decision to try a plant-based diet changed everything. 🌱  Follow the @Genv_India bio link for the full film. As we get older our eating patterns and behaviors are likely to change. While we can get all the nutrients we need on a vegan diet, there are things to be aware of as we age.  One common change as we get older among all diets is that we tend to eat less, which can lead to insufficient intakes of calcium, iron, zinc, B vitamins, and vitamin E. Even getting sufficient calories can be an issue.  But none of this has to be a problem.  Learn more about veganism in older age click the link below: https://genv.pulse.ly/wptngxgdlk  #age #ageisjustanumber #agepositive #ageless #aged #agegracefully #prime #elder #elderly #eldercare #elders #parents #grandparent #grandparents #grandma #grandpa #healthy #healthylifestyle #health #gethealthy #fruits #vegetables #nutrients #antioxidants #change #motivation #positivity #vegan #veganism #govegan

Every time you consume a milk product you take away milk meant for a calf.  Cows and buffaloes make milk for their young, not for humans.   To stop this injustice, go vegan today. Go to www.GenV.org to learn how.  हर बार जब आप किसी दूध उत्पाद का सेवन करते हैं तो आप बछड़े के लिए बना दूध उससे छीन लेते हैं।  गाय और भैंस अपने बच्चों के लिए दूध बनाती हैं, इंसानों के लिए नहीं।  इस अन्याय को रोकने के लिए आज ही वीगन बनें। वीगन बनने के बारे में अधिक जानने के लिए www.GenV.org पर जाएं।  Buffalo calf video courtesy: anipixels.com

Does breeding, caging, mutilating, and then killing animals in a slaughterhouse seem “natural” to you?  Let’s start questioning our “natural” choices. 🌱🤔  Via: Menkay   #FoodForThought #EthicalChoices

हम जो खाना चुनते हैं, वे तुरंत हमारे स्वास्थ्य और कल्याण को प्रभावित कर सकते हैं, और जब हम पहली बार वनस्पति-आधारित आहार को अपनाते हैं, तो बहुत से लोग कहते हैं कि उनकी ऊर्जा का स्तर, पाचन, त्वचा, बाल और नींद सभी में सुधार हुआ है।  क्या आप इसे करने की कोशिश करना चाहते हैं? फिर हमारी वेबसाइट पर जाएं और हमारी निःशुल्क चुनौतियों में से एक के लिए साइन-अप करें।

बारिश हो या धूप, भीषण गर्मी हो या सर्दी, इन मुर्गियों को इस तरह मीलों दूर ले जाया जाता है। इन छोटे बच्चों को ठूंस-ठूंसकर पिंजरों में भरा जाता है, जहां इनके पास हिलने-डुलने की भी कोई जगह नहीं होती।   इन युवा मुर्गियों को केवल 42 दिन की उम्र में ही मार दिया जाएगा। पशुपालन उद्योग में जानवरों को केवल वस्तुओं की तरह देखा जाता है जिनके शरीर और आत्मा के साथ मनुष्य जैसा चाहे व्यवहार कर सकता है।   मनुष्यों के लिए इन जानवरों की ज़िंदगी से लाभ कमाना ज़्यादा महत्वपूर्ण है। मनुष्य इस बारे में बिल्कुल भी नहीं सोचते हैं कि ये जानवर भी हमारी खुशी, दर्द, और पीड़ा महसूस करते हैं।  वीगन जीवनशैली अपनाकर हम पशुओं की पीड़ा को समाप्त करने का प्रयत्न सकते हैं और इस दुनिया में प्रेम को बढ़ावा दे सकते हैं।🐓🐥

अग्रणी हृदय रोग विशेषज्ञ के रूप में, डॉ. किम विलियम्स ने कहा: "हृदय रोग विशेषज्ञ दो प्रकार के होते हैं: पहले, वीगन लोग और दूसरे, वे लोग जिन्होंने स्त्रोत नहीं पढ़े हैं।"  स्रोतों के लिए, अधिक जानने के लिए और हमारे मुफ़्त 31-दिवसीय सहायता कार्यक्रम पाने के लिए, लिंक का अनुसरण करें: https://bit.ly/33LJcE4

प्रत्येक भोजन जो हम खाते हैं, उससे हम समुद्री जीवों को नकारात्मक तरीके से प्रभावित करते हैं और उनसे आत्मिक एवं भावनात्मक तौर पर बिल्कुल ही अलग हो गए हैं।  यह बात हमें यह पूछने के लिए प्रेरित करती है: हम यहाँ तक कैसे पहुंचे, और हमें मछली के साथ सहानुभूति रखने में कठिनाई क्यों होती है?

Kindness costs nothing. But when we choose to eat animals, we take the life of a sentient being.  Embrace kindness on your plate and in your heart. Choosing a vegan lifestyle is a compassionate step towards a more loving world. 🌱💚  #KindnessMatters #VeganLife #ChooseCompassion

गाय और बिल्ली दोनों के पास अंतर्निहित अधिकार हैं, फिर भी एक को ऐसे प्यार किया जाता है जैसे कि वे परिवार का हिस्सा हों, और दूसरे को पाला जाता है और मार दिया जाता है। जिन मायनों में ये मायने रखते हैं, ये जानवर अलग नहीं हैं।  यदि हम जानवरों की परवाह करते हैं, तो हमें उनके बारे में अपनी धारणा बदलनी होगी और उन सभी को संरक्षण के योग्य समझना होगा।  Cows and cats both have inherent rights, yet one is celebrated, and the other is farmed and killed. In the ways that matter, these animals are no different.  If we care about animals, we must change our perception of them and see them all as worthy of protection.  #cats #cows #SaveAnimals #AnimalRights #saveallanimals #loveanimals #pets
Kindness with Amy and PETA India visted an egg farm in Mumbai and what they saw will shock you.

मुर्गियाँ पृथ्वी पर सबसे अधिक प्रजनन की जानें वाली जानवर हैं और मनुष्यों के हाथों अकल्पनीय रूप से पीड़ित होती हैं। 🐔  99.9 प्रतिशत ब्रॉयलर मुर्गियां (जिनका मांस के लिए वध किया जाएगा) चिकन फैक्टरियों के अंदर दयनीय स्थिति में अपना जीवन व्यतीत करती हैं, और 98.2 प्रतिशत अंडे देने वाली मुर्गियां फैक्टरियों में छोटे पिंजरों में कैद हैं।

सोचिये क्या होगा जब वयस्क लोगों को पता चलेगा कि एक बच्चा वीगन बनना चाहती है?

वीगनवाद कोई ऐसी चीज़ नहीं है जो परिपूर्ण हो, न ही हम ऐसा होने का दावा करते हैं। लेकिन क्रूरता की दुनिया में - औद्योगिकीकृत और सामान्यीकृत - वीगन लोग जानवरों की पीड़ा में योगदान न करने का प्रयास करते हैं।  आज पशुओं के प्रति दयालु होना चुनें। वीगन बनें।  Vegans are not perfect, nor do we claim to be. But in a world of cruelty — both industrialized and normalized — vegans make an effort not to contribute to animal suffering.  Will you choose not to harm animals today? https://genv.pulse.ly/60cas4mqix  #vegan #perfect #AnimalRights #meat

बढ़ते वैज्ञानिक प्रमाण डेयरी उपभोग को कैंसर रोग और पुनरावृत्ति से जोड़ रहे हैं, खासकर जब बात स्तन और प्रोस्टेट जैसे हार्मोन-संवेदनशील कैंसर की हो।  आप जोखिम क्यों लेना चाहते हैं?  स्वास्थ्यप्रद - और स्वादिष्ट - पौधों पर आधारित विकल्प उपलब्ध हैं। आप इन्हें घर पर भी बना सकते हैं! https://genv.pulse.ly/6f9xrvegv8  A growing body of scientific evidence is linking dairy consumption to cancer disease and recurrence, especially when it comes to hormone-sensitive cancers such as breast and prostate. As we get older our eating patterns and behaviors are likely to change. While we can get all the nutrients we need on a vegan diet, there are things to be aware of as we age.  One common change as we get older among all diets is that we tend to eat less, which can lead to insufficient intakes of calcium, iron, zinc, B vitamins, and vitamin E. Even getting sufficient calories can be an issue.  But none of this has to be a problem. Learn more about veganism in older age here: https://genv.pulse.ly/l2dpwmyixh

हार्मोन हमारे शरीर के रासायनिक दूत हैं। वे आपके अंगों, मांसपेशियों, त्वचा और अन्य ऊतकों को यह बताते हुए रक्तप्रवाह में यात्रा करते हैं कि उन्हें क्या करना है और कब करना है।  कम से कम 50 हार्मोन तालमेल बैठाकर काम कर रहे हैं, और वे हमारे जीवन के हर पहलू को प्रभावित करते हैं, इसका मतलब है कि हमें उनकी जरूरत है कि वे बेहतर तरीके से काम करें ताकि हमारा इष्टतम स्वास्थ्य बना रहे।

क्या आप एक छोटे से पिंजरे में 4 महीने बिता पाएंगे?  ऐसा उन सूअरों के साथ होता है जिन्हें उनके मांस के लिए पाला जाता है।  सूअर संवेदनशील, बुद्धिमान जानवर हैं और अपने बच्चों की देखभाल करना चाहते हैं। लेकिन मादा सूअरों को उनकी पूरी गर्भावस्था के दौरान छोटे पिंजरों, जिन्हें जेस्टेशन क्रेट्स कहा जाता है, में कैद रखा जाता है। पशुपालन उद्योग केवल मुनाफे की परवाह करता है और इन मासूम जानवरों का शोषण करता है। गोवा, मध्य प्रदेश, कर्नाटक, पंजाब, हिमाचल प्रदेश और राजस्थान सहित कई राज्यों ने पहले ही निर्देश जारी कर दिए हैं कि सूअरों को कैद करने के लिए जेस्टेशन और फैरोइंग क्रेट्स (पिंजरों) के इस्तेमाल पर रोक लगा दी जाए।  लेकिन हमें इन मासूम जानवरों के हित के लिए और अधिक काम करने की ज़रूरत है और आप हमारी मदद कर सकते हैं।🙏🏽  इस याचिका पर हस्ताक्षर करके भारत सरकार से इन पिंजरों पर प्रतिबंध लगाने का आग्रह करें।  याचिका का लिंक प्राप्त करने के लिए कमेंट करें। आज ही इस पर हस्ताक्षर करें!

यदि कोई बेहतर विकल्प है, तो उसे क्यों न बनाया जाए! 🫶🏽  जई, चावल, मूंगफली, काजू, नारियल या तिल का दूध गाय के दूध के बेहतरीन विकल्प हैं। इन पौधों पर आधारित दूधों में तुलनात्मक रूप से कम संतृप्त वसा होती है और कोई कोलेस्ट्रॉल या हार्मोन नहीं होते हैं।🥛  वे पर्यावरण के लिए और आपके लिए भी बेहतर हैं! 💚 https://genv.org/hi/making-plant-milks-at-home/

Choosing the vegan option not only helps animals, but it is also the single biggest way to reduce our environmental impact.  According to a study conducted by Oxford University, cutting out meat and dairy products could reduce an individual’s carbon footprint from food by up to 73%. यह वह क्षण है जब पशु परीक्षण प्रयोगशाला से बचाए जाने के बाद डोरा ने अपनी पहली सैर की। हम उसके बचावकर्ताओं के बहुत आभारी हैं और उस पर हमें गर्व है।  डोरा जैसे 100 मिलियन से अधिक जानवर हर साल दुनिया भर में प्रयोगशालाओं के अंदर प्रयोगों को झेलते हैं। बहुत कम जानवर जीवित बच पाते हैं।  जानवरों पर परीक्षण करना बुरा विज्ञान है और यह क्रूर है। https://www. https://humanesociety.pulse.ly/grcdamlqqc पर और अधिक जानकारी प्राप्त करें  This is the moment that Dora took her first walk after being rescued from an animal testing laboratory. We are so grateful to her rescuers and so proud of this brave soul.  More than 100 million animals like Dora endure experiments worldwide inside labs every year. Very few animals make it out alive.  Testing on animals is bad science and it is cruel. Find out more at https://humanesociety.pulse.ly/ni2ge7ejzl

पौधों पर आधारित आहार पर प्रतिभागियों के लिए परिणाम इतने प्रभावशाली थे कि उन्होंने अध्ययन समाप्त होने के बाद भी आहार पर बने रहने का फैसला किया!  स्टैनफोर्ड प्रिवेंशन रिसर्च सेंटर के प्रोफेसर गार्डनर कहते हैं, "जो कोई भी वीगन आहार चुनता है, वह दो महीनों में अपने दीर्घकालिक स्वास्थ्य में सुधार कर सकता है, जिसमें सबसे अधिक बदलाव पहले महीने में देखा जाता है।"  आप किस का इंतजार कर रहे हैं? स्वास्थ्य के लिए हमारी निःशुल्क 7-दिवसीय वीगन चुनौती देखें और स्वादिष्ट, स्वस्थ खाद्य पदार्थों से अपने शरीर को ऊर्जा देना शुरू करें!  #HeartHealth #CardiovascularDisease #GoodHearted #wfpb #PreventiveMedicine #prevention

आमतौर पर लोगो का मानना है कि ‘वीगन-आहार’ महंगा है, लेकिन शोधो में सामने आने वाली सच्चाई हर बार इस तथ्य के विपरीत होती है।  पारंपरिक भारतीय भोजन अधिकांशतः सब्जियों, फ़लों, अनाज, दालों और बीजों पर निर्भर करता है, और ये सब वीगन है।

पशु क्रूरता को बढ़ावा कौन दे रहा है?  इस बात से मुंह मोड़ने के बजाय, सच्चाई का सामना करना और इस बात पर विचार करना कि हम इस प्रणाली में कैसे योगदान करते हैं, महत्वपूर्ण है।  इस क्रूरता को रोकने के लिए हम व्यक्तिगत रूप से क्या कर सकते हैं, इस बारे में पशु अधिवक्ता सेब एलेक्स के विचार सुनें।  लिंक पर क्लिक करें: https://youtu.pulse.ly/fsrckn6wlc  #animalovers #animalwelfare

यह डेयरी उद्योग की परेशान करने वाली हकीकत है। प्रत्येक बाड़े में एक "अवांछित" बछड़ा होता है, जो जन्म के समय अपनी मां से अलग हो जाता है, और केवल 18 सप्ताह की उम्र में वील के लिए वध किए जाने तक अकेले रखा जाता है।  हम इस संवेदनहीन क्रूरता को कैसे नजरअंदाज कर सकते हैं? 💔🐮  #dairy #milk #veal #farming #farm

Suffering prevails in the egg industry 🐔  Selectively bred to produce far too many eggs, chickens endure weak bones, fractures, and intense stress. When their productivity declines, they are sent to slaughter.  This is the sad reality of the egg industry. टाइप 2 डायबिटिक ब्रायन स्कोला, जो पहले बहुत मांस और आलू खाते थे, उनके द्वारा पौधे-आधारित आहार अपनाने का निर्णय लेने से पहले उन्हें दो बार दिल का दौरा पड़ा था, उनकी छाती में छह स्टेंट लगाए गए थे और उनका पांच-तरफ़ा बाईपास ऑपरेशन हुआ था। आज उनका हृदय बिल्कुल स्वस्थ है और वह मधुमेह-मुक्त हैं।  यह सिद्ध हो चुका है कि पौधा-आधारित वीगन आहार हृदय रोग, स्ट्रोक, टाइप 2 मधुमेह और कुछ प्रकार के कैंसर जैसी कुछ बीमारियों के जोखिम को कम करता है।  🌱 इस साल में पौधों पर आधारित वीगन चुनौती आज़माकर आज ही अपने स्वास्थ्य के लिए कदम उठाएं। साइन अप करें और @GenV_IND बायो लिंक में पूरी फिल्म देखें।  ________ https://genv.pulse.ly/dkxirums0b
